author: sproul
content:
I was reassured when you said it might not be exclusively Lighthouse nodes proposing 0-attestation blocks, but alas, there's a bug. Write-up here: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/3629.

Will try to get this merged to `unstable` ASAP, but no promises on a release as most of our team will be busy with Devcon for the next little while.

author: potuz
content:
> So the probability of proposing a 0-attestation block given a proposal assignment is approximately 1/32 * 1/8 = 0.39%.
I think the most impactful statistic would be that the probability per epoch of Lighthouse being the first block proposer is `.36` so that the chances that the first block of an epoch has zero attestations is about `4.5%`

author: sproul
content:
Yeah that’s a better way of putting it. In total roughly 1/1000 blocks will have 0 attestations

This explains some of the mysterious attestation misses we’ve seen across clients too!
